text: Neoterebra leptapsis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Neoterebra leptapsis (Simone, 1999). title: Neoterebra leptapsis
